Articles.Content:
A book full of simple paper airplanes meant to be folded along printed KSP art.  You would have Jeb riding a rocket or spaceplane etc..  Instructions could be included for optional addition of bottle rocket propulsion (to include locating the rocket in a spot where the center of thrust is somewhat near the center of mass and the change in mass of the rocket doesn't cause an excessive shift in CG.).

Pass these things out to 8 year olds!
